alert.note: Alert for Copiah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 1:03PM CDT until March 22 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR EASTERN COPIAH COUNTY... At 103 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Terry to Martinsville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Rockport and Hopewell around 120 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Beauregard and Georgetown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
